# cloudkarafka Provider

Interact with Cloudkarafka.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configuration-based authentication
provider "cloudkarafka" {
  apikey= "YOUR_API_KEY"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `apikey` (String, Sensitive) API key Cloudkarafka API.
